text: KXSB (101.7 FM) is a radio station broadcasting Spanish language programs. Licensed to Big Bear Lake, California, United States, it serves San Bernardino County, California. The station is currently owned by Radio Lazer. Previously, this was a locally-oriented station called KTOT-FM in the early 1990s. ==External links== *FCC History Cards for KXSB *Radio Lazer 101.7 y 100.9 Facebook XSB Category:Big Bear Valley Category:Mass media in San Bernardino County, California XSB Category:Radio stations established in 1995 Category:1995 establishments in California
title: KXSB
